attributes.action: change the law to make it illegal for ANY money received as the result of government taxation policy, either onshore or offshore, to be used in the funding of ANY of the activities of ANY political party within or without the boundaries of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite popular belief, taxpayer pounds continue to be used to fund the activities of party political activists both within and without the United Kingdom.  This has to stop until there is a properly organised and legally binding referendum where the taxpayer of the UK can state categorically whether or not they are prepared to fund such activity.
